scripts.build:lib: ng build @nftlabsupplies/ngx-paperxyz-sdk --configuration production && npm run copy-libdocs && npm run docs:generate
scripts.copy-libdocs: copyfiles -V -E README.md dist/ngx-paperxyz-sdk && copyfiles -V -E README.md projects/ngx-paperxyz-sdk
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run build:lib && npm run publish:lib
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run build:lib && npm run publish:lib
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run build:lib && npm run publish:lib
scripts.version:major: npm --no-git-tag-version version major && cd projects/ngx-paperxyz-sdk && npm --no-git-tag-version version major
scripts.version:minor: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && cd projects/ngx-paperxyz-sdk && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor
scripts.version:patch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && cd projects/ngx-paperxyz-sdk && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch
